alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Louisa, northwestern Goochland and Fluvanna Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmyra, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Mineral, Hadensville, Palmyra, Lake Monticello, Ferncliff, Kents Store, Troy, Orchid, Louisa Airport, Central Plains, Tabscott, Wilmington, Cunningham, Dixie, Nahor, Pendleton, Stage Junction, Zion Crossroads and Antioch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Louisa
